title: Our Products | Purple Pear Body Therapy: Massage & Spa Treatments
description: Our treatments and services incorporate the highest quality all-natural products. We feature skin care, body care, aromatherapy, hand and food treatments using Skin Script, Mountain Rose Herb, Aromatics International and more.
sitename: Purple Pear Body Therapy: Massage & Spa Treatments
cleaned_text: Our Products Purple Pear is proud to offer only the best in all-natural and organic body, skin, aromatherapy and nail products. Feeling good should be good for you! Shop for your mind, body and soul Our retail products allows you to recreate your Purple Pear experience at home. Every product has been carefully chosen and is off the highest quality. We proudly carry Mountain Rose Herbs, Aromatics International, Biofreeze, Skin Script, locally handmade goat milk soaps, flax seed therapy bags and so much more. Formulated just for you For many of our treatments, we custom formulate the products that we use according to your individual needs and desires. Our custom formulation only use all-natural and organic ingredients. We blend essential oils, pure plant extracts, natural oils, fresh fruits and other natural ingredients to create the perfect massage oil, scrub, mask or moisturizer just for you. Featured Products Purple Pear tailors all our product recommendations to your unique needs. Looking for a home care treatment plan? Stop by and let us customize the perfect regime and plan. Looking for products as a gift? Let us help you put together the perfect package or treat them with a gift card. ""I had the most amazing pedicure here.... I've never had anything like it, so relaxing and spa like. Pure bliss!" — Purple Pear Guest
